school.1: Who was your best friend in school and what were they like?
school.2: What was the craziest thing you ever did to get out of class?
school.3: What's the most interesting conversation you ever had with a classmate?
school.4: Did you ever have a secret crush on someone in school? Who was it?
school.5: What's the funniest prank you ever pulled on a classmate?
school.6: Did you ever skip school? Where did you go?
school.7: Who was your favorite teacher in school and why?
school.8: What's the most embarrassing thing you ever said or did in front of a crush at school?
school.9: What's the most valuable lesson you learned about friendship or relationships in school?
school.10: What's the most interesting project or presentation you worked on with a classmate?
school.11: Did you ever have a classmate that you initially didn't like, but then became good friends with? Who were they and what changed your opinion?
school.12: Who was your least favorite teacher in school and why?
school.13: What's the most valuable lesson you learned in school?
school.14: What's the most embarrassing thing that ever happened to you at school?
school.15: Did you ever have a school rival? Who were they and what made them your rival?
school.16: Did you ever have a crush on a teacher? Who was it?
school.17: What's the weirdest thing you ever ate in the school cafeteria?
school.18: What's the most interesting field trip you went on in school?
school.19: What's the most unusual talent someone in your class had?
school.20: What's the most embarrassing thing you ever wore to school?
school.21: What's the worst haircut you ever had in school?
school.22: What's the most ridiculous rule your school had?
school.23: Did you ever get detention? What did you do?
school.24: What's the most impressive thing you ever did for a school project or assignment?
school.25: What's the most embarrassing thing that ever happened to you while giving a presentation in school?
school.26: Did you ever get lost on the way to school? What happened?
school.27: What's the worst grade you ever got on a test or assignment?
school.28: What's the funniest nickname someone gave you in school?
school.29: What's the weirdest rumor you ever heard about yourself in school?
school.30: What's the most interesting thing you learned in school that has stuck with you?

work.12: What's the most ridiculous work-related injury you ever had?
work.13: What's the funniest thing a coworker ever said to you at work?
work.14: What's the most creative way you ever avoided work?
work.15: What's the most embarrassing typo you ever made in a work email?
work.16: What's the most ridiculous company policy you ever encountered?
work.17: What's the funniest work-related meme you ever saw?
work.18: What's the most ridiculous company team-building activity you ever experienced?
work.19: What's the most hilarious work-related joke you ever heard?
work.20: What's the most ridiculous thing you ever did to get a promotion?
work.21: What's the most absurd way you ever celebrated a work accomplishment?
work.22: What's the most ridiculous job title you ever encountered?
work.23: What's the most absurd dress code violation you ever witnessed at work?
work.24: What's the most ridiculous excuse a coworker ever gave for not finishing a task?
work.25: What's the funniest way you ever responded to a work-related crisis?
work.26: What's the most ridiculous thing you ever did to impress your boss?
work.27: What's the funniest way you ever passed time during a slow work day?
work.28: What's the most ridiculous work-related conspiracy theory you ever heard?
work.29: What's the most absurd reason you ever gave for quitting a job?
work.30: What's the funniest thing that ever happened in a work meeting?

travel.1: What's the worst thing that ever happened to you while travelling?
travel.2: If you could be any fictional character and go on a trip, who would you be and where would you go?
travel.3: What's the craziest thing you've ever done while on vacation?
travel.4: Have you ever gotten lost while travelling? Tell us about it.
travel.5: If you could only visit one place for the rest of your life, where would you choose?
travel.6: What's the most overrated tourist attraction you've ever been to?
travel.7: Have you ever accidentally offended someone while travelling?
travel.8: If you had to live in a hotel for a month, what kind of hotel would you choose and why?
travel.9: What's the funniest thing that ever happened to you while travelling?
travel.10: If you could teleport to any place in the world right now, where would you go?
travel.11: What's the weirdest food you've ever tried while travelling?
travel.12: What's the most interesting thing you've learned while travelling?
travel.13: Have you ever had a travel experience that changed your life? If so, how?
travel.14: What's the most ridiculous souvenir you've ever bought while travelling?
travel.15: What's the best travel hack you've ever learned?
travel.16: If you could travel back in time and visit any era, where would you go and why?
travel.17: What's the scariest thing that ever happened to you while travelling?
travel.18: What's the most unusual place you've ever stayed while travelling?
travel.19: What's the most beautiful natural site you've ever visited?
travel.20: What's the most impressive man-made structure you've ever seen?
travel.21: Have you ever been on a trip that was so bad you couldn't wait to get home?
travel.22: What's the most annoying thing other travellers do?
travel.23: If you could only travel with one person for the rest of your life, who would it be and why?
travel.24: What's the worst flight experience you've ever had?
travel.25: Have you ever travelled solo? How was your experience?
travel.26: If you could have any superpower while travelling, what would it be and why?
travel.27: What's the most interesting cultural difference you've experienced while travelling?
travel.28: What's the funniest misunderstanding you've had while travelling in a foreign country?
travel.29: If you could travel to any fictional place, where would you go and why?
travel.30: What's the one thing you never forget to pack when you travel?

worldview.1: What do you believe happens after we die?
worldview.2: Do you believe in God? Why or why not?
worldview.3: What is your opinion on abortion?
worldview.4: What do you think about same-sex marriage?
worldview.5: What is your stance on the death penalty?
worldview.6: Do you believe in free will or determinism?
worldview.7: What is your opinion on assisted suicide?
worldview.8: What do you think is the purpose of life?
worldview.9: Do you believe that humans have a moral obligation to protect the environment?
worldview.10: What is your opinion on gun control?
worldview.11: What is your opinion on capital punishment?
worldview.12: Do you believe in the concept of karma?
worldview.13: What is your opinion on the role of government in society?
worldview.14: Do you believe in the concept of sin?
worldview.15: What is your opinion on immigration?
worldview.16: What is your stance on euthanasia?
worldview.17: What is your opinion on censorship?
worldview.18: What is your stance on animal rights?
worldview.19: Do you believe in the concept of predestination?
worldview.20: What is your opinion on the use of drugs for medicinal purposes?
worldview.21: What is your opinion on the use of drugs for recreational purposes?
worldview.22: What do you think about the existence of extraterrestrial life?
worldview.23: Do you believe in the concept of reincarnation?
worldview.24: What is your opinion on the use of technology to enhance human abilities?
worldview.25: What is your stance on the existence of a higher power or deity?
worldview.26: Do you believe in the concept of evolution?
worldview.27: What is your opinion on the role of religion in society?
worldview.28: What is your stance on the use of the death penalty for non-violent crimes?
worldview.29: What is your opinion on the use of AI and automation in society?
worldview.30: Do you believe in the concept of an afterlife? If so, what does it look like to you?

social media.1: What's the funniest meme you've ever seen on social media?
social media.2: What's the weirdest YouTube video you've ever watched?
social media.3: If social media were a person, what kind of person would it be?
social media.4: What's the worst thing about social media?
social media.5: What's the best thing about social media?
social media.6: Have you ever accidentally sent a message to the wrong person on social media? What happened?
social media.7: What's the most annoying thing people do on social media?
social media.8: If you could only use one social media platform for the rest of your life, which one would it be and why?
social media.9: Have you ever stalked someone on social media? Who?
social media.10: What's the most embarrassing thing you've ever posted on social media?
social media.11: What's the craziest thing you've ever bought online?
social media.12: Have you ever trolled someone on the internet? What did you do?
social media.13: What's the weirdest thing you've ever seen for sale online?
social media.14: What's your biggest pet peeve about the internet?
social media.15: What's your favorite thing to do on the internet when you're bored?
social media.16: What's the funniest tweet you've ever read?
social media.17: What's the best prank you've ever played online?
social media.18: What's the worst thing you've ever read on a comment section?
social media.19: What's the most cringeworthy thing you've ever seen someone post on social media?
social media.20: What's the most ridiculous conspiracy theory you've ever heard online?
social media.21: What's the best thing about online shopping?
social media.22: What's the worst thing about online shopping?
social media.24: What's the most ridiculous thing you've ever seen go viral?
social media.25: What's your opinion on cancel culture on social media?
social media.26: Have you ever had an argument with a stranger online? What was it about?
social media.27: What's the most ridiculous thing you've ever searched for on the internet?
social media.28: What's the most interesting thing you've learned from the internet?
social media.29: What's the most useful website you've ever come across?
social media.30: If you could delete one social media platform from existence, which one would it be and why?

art.1: What's your favorite book and why?
art.2: Which movie had the biggest impact on you and why?
art.3: Who is your favorite musician or band and why?
art.4: Do you think movies, literature, and music have the power to change people's minds? Why or why not?
art.5: What's your favorite genre of books/movies/music and why?
art.6: Do you prefer classic or modern literature/films/music? Why?
art.7: What's a book or movie that you feel was overrated?
art.8: What's a book or movie that you feel was underrated?
art.9: Do you think it's important to read/watch/listen to things that challenge your beliefs and why?
art.10: Have you ever been moved to tears by a book, movie, or song? What was it and why?
art.11: What's a book or movie that you feel changed your life or the way you think about the world?
art.12: Do you think that the entertainment industry has a responsibility to address social and political issues? Why or why not?
art.13: What's a movie, book, or song that you think everyone should experience?
art.14: Do you prefer consuming books/movies/music on a physical or digital format? Why?
art.15: What's your opinion on the use of music in films? Do you think it can make or break a movie?
art.16: What's a book, movie, or song that you love but wouldn't recommend to everyone?
art.17: What's a book, movie, or song that you hated but everyone else seemed to love?
art.18: Do you think that movies, literature, and music reflect society or influence it more? Why?
art.19: What's a book, movie, or song that you think accurately portrays a social issue or problem?
art.20: Do you think it's important for movies, literature, and music to have diverse representation? Why or why not?
art.21: What's your opinion on movie adaptations of books? Do you prefer the book or the movie?
art.22: Do you think that the music industry today is better or worse than it was in the past? Why?
art.23: What's a book, movie, or song that you think was ahead of its time?
art.24: Do you prefer to consume music through an album or a playlist? Why?
art.25: What's your opinion on book or movie sequels? Do you think they're usually as good as the original?
art.26: Do you think that literature and movies have the power to change the world? Why or why not?
art.27: What's your opinion on censorship in the arts? Do you think there are any limits?
art.28: What's a movie, book, or song that you think has been unfairly criticized?
art.29: What's a movie, book, or song that you think has been overanalyzed or overhyped?
art.30: Do you think that art (movies, literature, music) should have a message or purpose? Why or why not?

relations.1: What do you think is the most important factor in a successful long-term relationship?
relations.2: Do you believe in the concept of 'the one' or do you think there are multiple people who could be a good match for you?
relations.3: How important is physical attraction to you in a romantic partner?
relations.4: Do you believe in the traditional gender roles in a relationship (i.e. the man being the provider, the woman taking care of the home)?
relations.5: What is your opinion on premarital sex?
relations.6: How important is open communication in a romantic relationship?
relations.7: Do you believe in forgiveness in a romantic relationship, even in the face of infidelity or betrayal?

relations.10: Do you believe in the concept of soulmates?
relations.11: How important is independence within a romantic relationship?
relations.12: Do you think it's possible to remain friends with an ex?
relations.13: How do you handle conflicts within a romantic relationship?
relations.14: What is your opinion on long distance relationships?
relations.15: Do you believe in the concept of 'love at first sight'?
relations.16: How important is financial stability in a romantic relationship?
relations.17: What is your opinion on online dating?
relations.18: Do you believe that a romantic relationship can last a lifetime?
relations.19: How important is trust in a romantic relationship?
relations.20: What is your opinion on marriage?
relations.21: How do you feel about having children in a romantic relationship?
relations.22: What is your opinion on polyamory?
relations.23: Do you believe in the concept of 'opposites attract'?
relations.24: How important is physical touch (i.e. hugging, kissing) in a romantic relationship?
relations.25: What is your opinion on jealousy in a romantic relationship?
relations.26: How do you feel about public proposals?
relations.27: What is your opinion on arranged marriages?
relations.28: Do you believe in the concept of unconditional love?
relations.29: How important is a sense of humor in a romantic relationship?
relations.30: What is your opinion on gender and sexual orientation in a romantic relationship?
